channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 155 Best Black Friday Deals 2025: We've Tested Every Item and Tracked Every Price
item.description: Our Reviews team has scoured the entire internet to find the best Black Friday deals on gear we've tested and approved.

item.title: The Best Amazon Device and Kindle Black Friday Deals (2025): Paperwhite, Scribe, Echo Dot Max

item.title: No, you can’t get your AI to ‘admit’ to being sexist, but it probably is
item.description: Though LLMs might not use explicitly biased language, they may infer your demographic data and display implicit biases, researchers say.

item.title: The Best Apple Black Friday Deals (2025)
item.description: If your AirPods, Apple Watch, or MacBook is on its last legs, now is the time to upgrade.

item.title: 14 Best Black Friday Phone Deals (2025)
item.description: Now is a great time to upgrade your phone. This Black Friday deals weekend has discounts ranging from the Google Pixel 9a to Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7.

item.title: 15 Best Black Friday TV Deals (2025)
item.description: Here are the best deals on screens from Hisense, TCL, Samsung, Sony, and more this shopping holiday.

item.title: How OpenAI and Google see AI changing go-to-market strategies
item.description: AI is changing how investors and startups bring their products to market. Three experts offered their insights at TechCrunch Disrupt.

item.title: SoftBank stays in as Meesho $606M IPO becomes India’s first major e-commerce listing
item.description: Meesho heads for India's first big e-commerce IPO next week.
